talk.abstract: The future is parallel. In this rapidly evolving parallel world, the scoop is that parallel programming can be much simpler, transparent and elegant. Introducing SCOOP, a new distributed task package allowing easy concurrent parallel programming on various environments. We propose a new way of handling distributed computing based on simplicity, beauty and the Future (see PEP-3148).

talk.name: Once you Scoop, no need to fork
talk.title: Once you Scoop, no need to fork
